# Approach
Where possible, I try to use example data/analyses for our chapters that have been published in peer-reviewed journals or in university lecture course material.

In terms of R syntax, I generally try to follow the approach presented on the ["R for Data Science" website](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/){target="_blank"}, making use of:
